result.eng: Translate it into English please.
result.ga: Aistrigh go Béarla é le do thoil
result.orig: Aistrigh go Béarla é le do thoil
result.html: Aistrigh go Béarla é le do thoilTranslate it into English please.
result.ponchtml: Aistriġ go Béarla é le do ṫoilTranslate it into English please.

result.eng: They ran into me on the road.
result.ga: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhóthar
result.orig: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhóthar
result.html: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhótharThey ran into me on the road.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail siad umam ar an ḃóṫarThey ran into me on the road.

result.eng: I need to look into the question.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrú
result.orig: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrú
result.html: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrúI need to look into the question.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé an ċeist a ḟiosrúI need to look into the question.

result.eng: The example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ga: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.orig: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.html: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrthaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ponchtml: Cuideoiḋ na habairtí samplaċa leat na focail a ḟí isteaċ i do ċuid cainte go nádúrṫaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.

result.eng: He ran into the room.
result.ga: Rith sé isteach sa seomra
result.orig: Rith sé isteach sa seomra
result.html: Rith sé isteach sa seomraHe ran into the room.
result.ponchtml: Riṫ sé isteaċ sa seomraHe ran into the room.

result.eng: I want to go into Galway to see it.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom dul isteach go Gaillimh len é a fheiceáil
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom dul isteach go Gaillimh len é a fheiceáil
result.html: Ba mhaith liom dul isteach go Gaillimh len é a fheiceáilI want to go into Galway to see it.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom dul isteaċ go Gailliṁ len é a ḟeiceáilI want to go into Galway to see it.

result.eng: Come here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ga: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat
result.orig: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat
result.html: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ i leiṫ uait Isteaċ an ċisteanaċ leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!

result.eng: For many reasons, this country is divided into two states.
result.ga: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá stát
result.orig: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá stát
result.html: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá státFor many reasons, this country is divided into two states.
result.ponchtml: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deiġilte ina dá státFor many reasons, this country is divided into two states.

result.eng: It was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ga: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.orig: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.html: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamhIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ponchtml: Ise a rinne ceap magaiḋ dínne agus dár gcreideaṁIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!

result.eng: They turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.
result.ga: Tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféise
result.orig: Tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféise
result.html: Tiontaíonn siad cúis mhaith ina ceap áiféiseThey turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.
result.ponchtml: Tiontaíonn siad cúis ṁaiṫ ina ceap áiféiseThey turn a good cause into an object of ridicule.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: She skidded and fell head-first into the water.
result.ga: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisce
result.orig: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisce
result.html: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisceShe skidded and fell head-first into the water.
result.ponchtml: Ṡleaṁnaiġ sí is ṫit ar ṁullaċ a cinn isteaċ san uisceShe skidded and fell head-first into the water.

result.eng: "What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ga: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.orig: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.html: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ponchtml: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a ċaiṫ Rebekka an baḃla isteaċ sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.

result.eng: She went into the storage place crouching.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.orig: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.html: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí isteaċ san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ Meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.

result.eng: I translated the information into Irish for her.
result.ga: D'aistríos an t-eolas go Gaeilge di
result.orig: D'aistríos an t-eolas go Gaeilge di
result.html: D'aistríos an t-eolas go Gaeilge diI translated the information into Irish for her.
result.ponchtml: D'aistríos an t-eolas go Gaeilge diI translated the information into Irish for her.

result.eng: She was breaking into tears.
result.ga: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthi
result.orig: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthi
result.html: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthiShe was breaking into tears.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an gol ag briseaḋ uirṫiShe was breaking into tears.

result.eng: Night turned into day.
result.ga: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an lá
result.orig: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an lá
result.html: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an láNight turned into day.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ an oíċe ṫart go dtáinig an láNight turned into day.

result.eng: Tall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
result.ga: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéir
result.orig: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéir
result.html: Simléirí arda dubha ag teilgean toite sa spéirTall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.
result.ponchtml: Simléirí arda duḃa ag teilgean toite sa spéirTall black chimneys spewing smoke into the sky.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: Tears came into his eyes.
result.ga: Tháinig na deora leis
result.orig: Tháinig na deora leis
result.html: Tháinig na deora leisTears came into his eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig na deora leisTears came into his eyes.
